name: Stephanie Staples
description:
Stephanie Staples ( - )
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Stephanie Staples in mp3 format.  Stephanie Staples has traveled across the United States and all the way to China to share her music. Her long list of credits include festivals, retreats, universities, schools (elementary, middle, and high schools), churches, conferences, campus ministries, multiple centers for disadvantaged youth/inner city ministries, military bases, and shelters for the homeless.
She has performed before 20,000 at New Zealandâ€™s Parachute Music Festival, joining Third Dayâ€™s Mac Powell for a powerful rendition of the duet, â€œGod of Wonders,â€ has made many trips to Brooklyn, New York to minister at Teen Challenge, an organization founded by David Wilkerson to help the addicted, and has opened for a variety of artists including Third Day, Tammy Trent, Newsong, and Jaci Valasquez.
